text:
**Hold Oscar **❤️

A new event is live. From **8–11 September**, [buy](https://t.me/portals/market?startapp=) Mini Oscars and farm tickets

At first every Oscar gives you a **gray ticket**
Hold it for 3 days — and your ticket turns **gold**
Gold tickets unlock the prizes

**Prizes are: **
– 1 Plush Pepe
– 2 Heart Lockets
– 3 Durov’s Caps

Winners will be chosen randomly
More gold tickets = more chances

[**Check event page in your profile**](https://t.me/portals/market?startapp=)
